original_title: At Last...The Beginning: The Making of Electric Ladyland
overview: Granting behind-the-scenes access into the making of Jimi Hendrixâ€™s third and final proper studio album, this documentary includes interviews with the musicians and producers involved in the recording process. Segments with Buddy Miles, Eddie Kramer and more provide revealing insight while vintage Hendrix clips help bring the picture into sharp focus.
title: At Last...The Beginning: The Making of Electric Ladyland
